mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date, stock_cnt) VALUES (seq_product_prod_no.NEXTVAL,#{prodName},#{prodDetail},#{manuDate},#{price},#{fileName},SYSDATE,1)
mapper.select: SELECT PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_DETAIL, MANUFACTURE_DAY, PRICE, IMAGE_FILE, REG_DATE, STOCK_CNT FROM product WHERE prod_no=#{value}
SELECT PROD_NO, PROD_NAME FROM product WHERE prod_name=#{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.PROD_NO, p.PROD_NAME, p.PROD_DETAIL, p.MANUFACTURE_DAY, p.PRICE, p.IMAGE_FILE, p.REG_DATE, p.stock_cnt FROM PRODUCT p
WHERE p.PROD_NO LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE p.PROD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE p.PRICE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY ${orderColurm} ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT prod_no, prod_name, price FROM product
AND PROD_NO LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND PROD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND PRICE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
) countTable
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(cart_id, user_id, prod_no, flag) VALUES (seq_cart_prod_no.NEXTVAL,#{userId},#{prodNo},'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT flag FROM cart WHERE prod_no=#{prodNo} AND user_id=#{userID} AND flag='Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT c.cart_id, c.prod_no, c.flag, p.prod_name, p.stock_cnt FROM cart c, product p WHERE user_id=#{buyerId} AND flag='Y' AND p.prod_no = c.prod_no ORDER BY cart_id ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN (#{search.currentPage}-1)*#{search.pageSize}+1 AND #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize}
select prod_name from product where prod_name like concat('%',concat(UPPER(#{value}),'%')) or prod_name like concat('%',concat(LOWER(#{value}),'%'))
